Detailed Description

Definition at line 47 of file CmdLightPositionModified.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdLightPositionModified::CmdLightPositionModified ( TLightKit *  light,
double  azimuth,
double  zenith,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new lightKit position command that represents a light move with parent parent.

The new position is defined by azimuth and zenith in radians.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdLightPositionModified::redo ( ) [virtual]

Applies a change to the scene. After redo() the light position will be the position defined by the constructor parameters.

See also:
undo().

Definition at line 78 of file CmdLightPositionModified.cpp.

References TLightKit::ChangePosition(), lightKit, m_newAzimuth, and m_newZenith.

void CmdLightPositionModified::undo ( ) [virtual]

Reverts to the previous light positions. After undo() is called, the light position will be the same as before redo() was called.

See also:
redo().

Definition at line 69 of file CmdLightPositionModified.cpp.

References TLightKit::ChangePosition(), lightKit, m_oldAzimuth, and m_oldZenith.
